editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-33v: Prayer of Our Lady Mary at Golgotha, Säne Golǝgota, ጸሎተ፡ እግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ዘሰኔ፡ ጎልጎታ፡, incomplete at the beginning (with a painting over the first folio). Copied and printed several times in its Gə‘əz and Amharic versions, e.g., ጸሎተ፡ እግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ዘሰኔ፡ ጎልጎታ፡ በመቃብረ፡ እግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ (Addis Ababa: Täsfa, 1949 E.C.); ጸሎተ፡ እግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ዘሰኔ፡ ጎልጎታ፡ (Addis Ababa: Täsfa, 1963 E.C.); see also Grébaut, “La prière de Marie au Golgotha,” and Basset, Apocryphes 5 30 –47; StrLin 47, ; EMML 1213, . F-36v: Excerpts from Image of Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, Mälk‘a Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, መልክአ፡ ገብረ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡, and Image of Saint George, written in a later hand. Illuminations. : Four men, one holding a book in one hand and a rod in the other. : Our Ldy Mary, crowned, with Jesus seated on her right. : A woman, holding a handkerchief, before a crowd. : Jesus (left) and a man, surrounded by a crowd. : A woman, holding a child on her back, before a man, surrounded by a crowd. Notes. mentions an owner, ገብረ ኢየሱስ.
